item.title: Fedora First Things to Do
item.description: Updated: 4-18-2020 Commands to Run After Install 1. Update Fedora $ sudo dnf update && sudo dnf distro-sync -y && sync && sudo dnf autoremove Reboot System -Autoremove Fix Removes the initially-installed kernel in order to fix dnf autoremove This will vary depending on the Fedora image version used Find original Kernal Installed sudo dnf list --installed 'kernel'* sudo dnf remove *5.3.7* && sync 2. Change Hostname $ hostnamectl status # view current hostname $ hostnamectl set-hostname --static "deathstar" # set up new hostname 3.
